website_summaries.verdict: If your top concern is low price instead of overall value, this magnetic door is the best option for you.
pros: Basic and affordable, with similar features of others on our list such as sewn-in Velcro and easy installation
cons: There are some reported issues with ill-fitting frames
Screen isn't as durable as other models – tears easily

customer_reviews.title: One star off because it has been a week and it still smells like rubber. We had to leave the door closed ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. I ended up ditching the Velcro tape and stapling it directly to my doorframe. Figured it would last longer that way. Fits a normal 36" door perfectly. And the magnets hold it together with very little gaps. One star off because it has been a week and it still smells like rubber. We had to leave the door closed for the first few days just to get rid of the smell. Now it's somewhat bearable but still smells. Update. Upping my rating from 4 to 5 stars. I bought another one for my parents house. Placed the order yesterday. It arrived today at noon. Amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Will Phan

customer_reviews.title: Low Cost is All
customer_reviews.text: We received the product with a slice in the fabric at one of the magnet locations. Not the end of the world, but not exactly desirable either. Almost immediately after installation the stitching for the two halves gave way at the top connection points. Again, not the end of the world, but also not desirable. The strength of the magnets to keep the doors halves together is marginal at best. The final straw for returning this product was when the glue on the provided hook and loop tape failed. We thoroughly cleaned the application site, but that didn't matter. We came home to our screen in a pile at the foot of our door.
customer_reviews.author: Rob G.

customer_reviews.title: Looks better than I thought it would!
customer_reviews.text: This looks so good! I have a problem with wasps finding their way into my open door in the summer and this is a life saver. You can see through it just fine but it keeps the bugs out and let’s the summer air in. I thought it would look tacky, but it actually looks pretty good!
customer_reviews.author: MaryMary

customer_reviews.title: Cover girl is a worker not a model ha
customer_reviews.text: This may have a rough looking foreign girl on the front but she must be a builder not a model because this product has been performing great alll week. It's not cheap like the rest, I have tried 4 others and this is the best. Comes with tacks so you don't have to stick to painted wood. It will peel off paint, be careful. Has good amount of weight at bootm to keep magnets aligned. Will change review if for some reason it starts taking a dive. In meantime, find a better cover image for this seller.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: It is very good product. Easy to install and looks so match ...
customer_reviews.text: It is very good product. Easy to install and looks so match with my door. But a little tricky when you set it up. You should let the top of the screen level so that the magnets are able to align and stick to each other perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Lol

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR USE AS A DOGGIE DOOR!  Even on a SLIDING DOOR, which is where I use it!
customer_reviews.text: I luv, luv, luv this product!!! I have 3 large dogs (2 black & 1 yellow labs). They are VERY ROUGH on ANYTHING I buy! This screen door is the ONLY ONE that lasts the entire Spring & Summer & even into The Fall Seasons!! The trick is to hang the screen level or JUST ABOVE the door entry, as I have found that it prevents them from stepping on it, which tears the bottom of the screen. I would HIGHLY RECOMMEND IT!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly L. Masten

customer_reviews.title: Great value and works
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Had the screen up a few months and has held together well with daily traffic from kids and dog. I especially like that it closes automatically after the dog. I did have to trim the bottom a little to get it to fit but it did not affect the performance.
customer_reviews.author: nisabisa

customer_reviews.title: Not as perfect as I hoped it would be?
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box, the quality seemed great, and the installation was easy. But the first day I had it up, I had a LOT of company going through the door, and by the end of the day, one of the middle strips had torn loose at the top. I can stitch it back together - I'll just chalk that off to "grandkid abuse". Of course, once the strip tore loose, the screen didn't self-close any more; plus it has a tendency to magnetically stick to the steel entry door or the steel table next to the door in our breezeway (but that's not a "quality" issue). I might try removing the bottom magnets to see if that helps?
customer_reviews.author: D. Masselink

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put up, quality and works!
customer_reviews.text: This fits my needs perfectly. It arrived today and I am enjoying sitting in my living room with fresh air flowing through without the bugs or mosquitos. I’m a senior citizen and this was so easy to put together. I just put the tape on then I put the screen on the Velcro. This is just wonderful for me. I put my reclining chair next to the door so I can close my door quickly if anyone comes by. This is life changing as I can now open my door in the early AM and enjoy the birds and morning breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does it’s job
customer_reviews.text: We opted to tack the screen onto our door frame instead of Velcro since the frame is extremely uneven from decades of paint being thrown on it. It only took half a day for my two dogs to learn how to run through it, and I love it! We now are able to enjoy sunlight and a nice breeze without worrying about bugs wandering into our home. Why didn’t we buy this three years ago??? My only complaint is one of the tacks lost had its plastic head broken by my hammer. User error?
customer_reviews.author: akosaurus

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE: Deceptive advertising - NOT 36x83”
customer_reviews.text: In this ad and in large print on this product it says, “ACTUAL SCREEN SIZE 36”x83”. Fits door size 34x82.” My door is 34” wide; so is this screen. After installation, I have a 2” gap and door won’t close. I’m madder than hell at these liars. The ACTUAL SCREEN WIDTH IS 34”. It uses up 2” Velcroing it to the door frame.
customer_reviews.author: R. Price

customer_reviews.title: Works great, pets can be a little hard on these
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! Bottom line, works exactly as promised, installs in minutes and easy to maintain. It's my second. My first was shredded by one of our dogs. We've since trained her to come to another door to get in if the door in front of this is closed but even the most durable material is going to have a hard time standing up to claws. Attn manufacturer: Would love to see one of these design just for pets with a solid top and the opening only on the bottom or a combination of a way to use it for people and dogs that doesn't allow for the entire thing to open when a dog walks through it.
customer_reviews.author: SK in UT

customer_reviews.title: Best design yet
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these screens for years, this is by far the best design and quality. It is one piece, others were a two piece design, much easier to hang. The magnets are larger and sown into the material, others the magnets catch, fall off and are a source for catching and tearing, these being sown in, no catch point, also it appear there are small rod weights at the center point to help hold together. This one so well made and functional, took the pets a little getting use to the better fit and hold together. Highly recommend, especially if you've been disappointed by others that fall apart.
customer_reviews.author: Urban Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Higher Quality than Expected
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this after un-installing an Anderson retractable screen door ($160) that was a joke. I was skeptical, but saw all the good reviews and took a chance. This one was for the basement door. I just ordered another for the main back door. The unit I received was actually 37" wide, so I had to tweak the install a bit. Installation took less than 15 minutes. I used both velcro and the tacks. When winter arrives, I'll just pull the tacks and peel it off until spring. The magnets align and close perfectly every time. Also, our old, blind dog now let's himself in/out by nudging it with his nose.
customer_reviews.author: Red-Badger

customer_reviews.title: Not good for small dogs nor big people
customer_reviews.text: Probably good enough for most people but definitely not great in my particular case. Lower quality than I would have expected and I really think it will only last one season. We have two small dogs (Westies, so not exactly tiny) and this will only close back about 50% of the times when they use it. When we use, it closes back about 90% of the times. I am 6’5” with large shoulders and need to snag myself badly to go through it as the clearance at the top is not as large as in the middle and bottom. If you are big and tall or have small dogs I would suggest to look for other brands or alternatives.
customer_reviews.author: Flavio, MI

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Worked exactly as needed for my deck doorway.
customer_reviews.text: I have a doorway leading to a deck at our rental lodge that constantly is left open. Couldn't get a standard wooden screen door due to the way the door opened so found this as an alternative. Ive had installed for about a month now and I'm impressed with it! Very durable. Definitely has succeeded at keeping the bugs out. And it's easy for us and guests to go in and out. The magnetic closure is key on it and works well..I bought something like this years ago without the magnets and hated it. Also, the provided velcro was easy to install. Just follow the included instructions. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany B.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect in everyway!
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could give it more stars so that it could go above all the other crappy mesh nets being sold. This one fits tight and snug around the edges of my door unlike the last two did. It also has what seems like extremely durable fiberglass mesh rather than the paperlike material the others use. It also has really strong magnets, with no gaps along the middle seal. And they even though about adding weights to the bottom of the item that helps so much to keep it all tight and sealed. Also comes with push pins, but the glue on and velcro is so strong that it seems redundant. Great product and it was the cheapest too!
customer_reviews.author: Prime Groover

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these one for front and back doors and the mesh his ripped around the top of both and the weights have fallen out of both. I'm fortunately I missed the 30 day return window so 40 days later they are both broken.
customer_reviews.author: Kc

customer_reviews.title: uncertain
customer_reviews.text: I tried to install this over the weekend. I have a french door setup where only one opens. I tried several different ways and the magnet would not close towards the bottom. I'd have to give it a kick to get them to close. I might trim it up and try again. I figure I have nothing to lose since I'll be throwing it away or re-purposing if it doesn't work. Honestly, being a dog-owner, I wanted the functionality vs a sliding screen door but the aesthetics don't look near as clean as a slider. Maybe if I got the white it would but I can't imagine how dirty that gets.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: I’m happy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep the bugs out my house. My cat like me to go in and out the house during the day. My townhouse is concrete so the adhesive is not sticking very well. I cannot use the thumbtacks because of the concrete. It’s been up for less than a week. I just rub my hand across the edges to make sure it’s still everyday. Didn’t take my cat long to figure out how it works. She likes to stick her paw under it so I could of brought it down some more. Overall I’m very happy. Really helps Keep most with the flying bugs out.
customer_reviews.author: Eshuana

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says it will do.
customer_reviews.text: We wanted to be able to take advantage of the wonderful air flow-through that our apartment has when the door is open, without worrying about bugs coming in from the hallway. The only problem is the length; our doorway has a tall lintel so the "door" does not go all the way down by about 5 inches. Also, when the wind really gets going at times, it is just TOO MUCH for the door and it opens up and starts flapping. But that is in pretty heavy wind , so a rare occurrence Other than that is was easy to install, and keeps the critters out.
customer_reviews.author: damouse

customer_reviews.title: Attaches easily and works most of the time.
customer_reviews.text: This works the same as every other one does. 8 out 10 times it goes together and 2 times it hangs almost closed. There is no way to get this perfect and I had the same thing with other brands I tried. I have 3 dogs and they do not like these so I tie up the bottom couple feet so they can go out and not thru it. It still keeps out the majority of the bugs as they fly and only the bottom section is open now.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Keeping Flying Bugs Out
customer_reviews.text: Cutting to the chase, I recommend this screen and believe it is a good value. The screen is well made and the advertised dimensions are accurate. It is roughly 2 inches wider and hangs a little longer than my door frame. I made a small fold at the middle of the top of the screen and nailed the fold to the top door frame with the supplied nails. The screen now fits the width of the door frame. So if you are concerned that the screen is larger than your door frame, it can be made to work quite well.
customer_reviews.author: Philip Ho

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty, better than ones bought in stores.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice heavy duty magnetic screen door. It came with more than enough Velcro to go around 3 sides of the door frame and came with a tool to seal the Velcro together easily. The magnets are long and strong and spaced a good distance to keep the door closed. I purchased this for my mother who lives in an apartment and her neighbors were impressed with the thickness and quality of the screen, compared to theirs that they purchased locally. She had several neighbors writing down the name of the product to purchase one for themselves on the first day it was up.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Payne

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I have used magnetic bug screen before and I know about installing however I had trouble doing so because this time, I had to install this between outside door and weather screen door. So for my situation Velcro was useless and I had to use just nails that came with it. I also added a little fabric strip on both inside and outside of this screen to make it easy to break the seal for my door situation, or when the other side of the door is shut, and it seems to work so far. 4 stars because I haven’t used the item long enough to see if it’s durable or not.
customer_reviews.author: hskll

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this
customer_reviews.text: I have been using screen doors like this for 5 years and probably replaced it every year. Just bought this one and I am extremely happy with the difference between this one and all my others. This one fits my door better, so no more folding to make it fit. It has weights on the bottom and more magnets down the opening so closes much easier and quieter. But most of all, the whole thing is just much more stronger and I’m sure much more durable. It’s only been up a few days but I love it. No more as seen on tv screens for me.
customer_reviews.author: Carr’s

customer_reviews.title: One happy mama
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 anf they lasted all summer. In the past we maybe get 2/3 months out of them. We have 3 dogs busting through and I have 2 reckless children so I'm very happy with how they held up. I will note that I staple gunned mine to the frame because I know how my family acts lol and I made sure to secure that middle top part so it would snap easy every time. If not the magnets aren't always strong enough to pull together if there is a breeze. Other then those small adjustments the material didn't rip and I'm one happy mama!
customer_reviews.author: Anthony R. Sutphin Jr

customer_reviews.title: Homearda magnetic screen door
customer_reviews.text: This is my third magnetic screen and by far the best!! The trim is sturdy and enveloped in a black trim. It comes with a ROLL of Velcro PLUS it’s ALREADY attached to the screen! SUPER easy to install, took all of 10 minutes to attach and nail. I will purchase this brand going forward. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Manual closing needed....
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one for myself. Then I ordered one for my Son. For some reason, there was a price differential. This product worked great for the first 7 days. After that, it would not close by itself. As you will see in the photos, there is a gap at the top, when it is closed. I would have given five stars had it worked as good as it did when it was first installed. It is durable and does what it’s made to do-when closed all the way! They send extra velcro with it. I received an entire roll. Which I only used half of.
customer_reviews.author: Pooh

customer_reviews.title: i liked the first one so much, i bought a second one
customer_reviews.text: my old farmhouse had no screen doors when i bought it. until i can afford to replace all the doors, i bought these to use until then. they are easy to install, they come with much more sticky tape than the instructions seem to think, you don't have to cut it into strips like the instructions say. now, a hard wind will blow them open, but, they work better than i expected them to, especially for the price. i have suggested them to several friends. they are definitely a good interim screen door.
customer_reviews.author: Warlord

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It fit on my door great, it is a few inches longer, but I prefer that than having a crack at the bottom for bugs to fly/crawl through. They give you more than enough velcro to use & the adhesion is very strong. The magnets are okay, they fly open if the wind is too strong, but find their way back eventually. I ended up sticking some velcro across the magnets perpendicularly to keep them shut during use - works well since I don't actually walk through it more than a couple times a day. For the price, its not bad!
customer_reviews.author: Hae Jin Ha

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I have a sliding glass door and a dog. She would jump on the door to come back into the house and tore up the screen door which I removed. I still wanted some air flow and this fiberglass mesh magnetic sealing door did the trick! Extremely easy to install, great adhesion of the Velcro, and good magnets makes this an absolute no brainer of a product! My dog can come in, I still get my airflow, and it is easily removed! I can't say enough about how I love this mesh door!
customer_reviews.author: deb1210

customer_reviews.title: Got multiple tears in 11 months
customer_reviews.text: Mines already developed tears. It was installed to an exterior door to the patio. But since it is fiberglass mesh I should be able to repair it with some mesh patches. I had a different polyester door mesh for much longer and it has lasted much longer, granted it is installed indoors. The magnets are pretty good. One issue you you can come across with the magnets is if you have a metal door. It will stick to it and leave the mesh open for bugs to get in.
customer_reviews.author: ImBZppl

customer_reviews.title: Makes a great alternative to screen door, especially with dogs
customer_reviews.text: So far I love this. I’ve had it up for about 2 weeks. I bought it because my Great Dane plowed into our screen door and ruined it. He is able to run in and out of this freely. My only problem with it is the adhesive strips don’t hold up at the top very well so I had to use the tacks (included) to keep it attached to the door frame. If that part sags at all the middle does not fall back together where the magnets hold it closed. Otherwise, love it. Everyone that comes over and sees it complements how handy it is.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: 👌
customer_reviews.text: This product actually works and well priced! I was having some mosquito issues and this help about 99.99%. The small percentage is if you hold the net open too long, of course a bug has a chance to slip right through. It is durable. It works well with dogs too. I highly recommend that after you install the double sided tape, use the pins (included) to hold the screen down. I didn’t used it at first and it made the screen slowly peel off. Once i pinned it down the screen is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: The fiberglass version is a great product and quality that lasts!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Great quality and price. The fiberglass one is the best one on the market yet. I have install 10s of those for the past none of the other brand last longer than 6 months. I purchased this one about a year ago for my garage entry door and it holds up great like brand new still. Since I do handyman work that I have been recommending to everybody and install 6 more to my clients for the past 3months so far.
customer_reviews.author: Yimmiyo

customer_reviews.title: Good for our balcony door
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the door to the balcony off our bedroom. I used an industrial size staple gun to secure it (wasn't real impressed with the stickies that came with it). Fair warning to pet owners though...our cat learned fast how it opens, and takes advantage of it when we are outside (upside: no more jumping up and down to let said cat in and out). Not sure how well it would hold up in a high traffic spot...doesn't seem to be the most sturdy material. Good for light use.
customer_reviews.author: vstarjewel

customer_reviews.title: GOOD QUALITY
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE OUR 105 LB GERMAN SHEPHERD PUT THIS TO THE TEST. PASSED WITH FLYING COLORS!! TOOK LITTLE BIT FOR IT TO CLOSE PROPERLY BUT THAT WAS MY FAULT AS HAD ORDERED TWO INCHES TWO LONG. EASILY SOLVABLE WITH EXTRA VELCRO. OVER TEN YEARS WITH OUR DOG I HAVE HAD MULTITUDE OF THESE SCREENS SOME I PAID MORE SOME I PAID LESS. HOWEVER, THIS BEST QUALITY EASIEST TO MOUNT EXTREMELY DURABLE AND LOOKS GOOD AS WELL. THE ATTACHMENT SYSTEM IS SIMPLE AND HIGHLY ADAPTABLE
customer_reviews.author: buff42

customer_reviews.title: Would be better if the adhesive stuck
customer_reviews.text: Edit: at this time it’s not even sticking for longer than 2 minutes, I’ve taken it down till I get some other adhesive or just nail it in. This is I’m the second time I bought this because my dogs tore the first one pretty bad. I really do like this but the adhesive is horrible. It worked better the first time I bought but this time I (or the husband) have to put it back up multiple times a day, especially when the sun is really hitting it.
customer_reviews.author: Chanel Marie

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one we have bought. The first we left at our apartment when we moved out. The other was a different brand. I installed it while my husband was at work. When he inspected it, he stated it was a lot more thick and better quality than the last one we purchased. The adhesive on the Velcro strip is very strong so make sure you know exactly where you want it and apply carefully! Our dog is taking a little time figuring he can go outside and in whenever he pleases. I guess he ran into the glass door one too many times...
customer_reviews.author: Stacy and Josh

customer_reviews.title: Great concept - needs some improvement
customer_reviews.text: While I was in love with this concept for being able to leave doors open on pretty days for dogs to go in and out, it just did not work for us. The screen was way to big for our standard sliding glass door. If you have hot sun in mornings or afternoons, the velcro sticky side just melts off leaving the product sagging or completely falling off door. I ended up just taking the whole thing down as I spent most of my time sticking it back to door.
customer_reviews.author: Jill H.

customer_reviews.title: I like the material it's made of, instructions not so much
customer_reviews.text: Instructions must have been written by a 3rd grades. If your not intuitive with assembly, don't buy. IE: it tells you to cut the velcro in 8 pieces for the sides, no need, there is more than enough to run the full length of both sides. They put a plastic tool in with the velcro but I have no clue what it's for but I'm sure it must have a good use. I like the material it's made of and the visiblety through it.
customer_reviews.author: CA

customer_reviews.title: Amazing screen!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! The last one I got at Big Lots was so cheap It did not last long at all. The adhesive never stuck well. This one by far beats that one. I have not had any problems with the adhesive or the magnets. It keeps all of the bugs out And the screen is of really good quality. I have children who love to go in and out of the house to play and during the cooler months using this screen helps with that and it helps keep it cool it my house. It even works with a baby gate. I definitely recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Orellana

customer_reviews.title: Not a fan of the adhesion.
customer_reviews.text: I finally put this up last week. Cleaned the doors good, made sure it was dried before putting on. Looked great after finally getting up. Went outside about a hour later and it was gone. All the adhesion came off and screen was about 5 feet away from door. Maybe wind I’m still not sure on that one. Tried sticking adhesion back on and it wouldn’t stick. So I threw it away. Besides all that it looked pretty durable.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Great screen door.
customer_reviews.text: I love this little invention and so do my huge dogs. We hate to have to run back and forth and let the dogs out when it is warmer out and do not want to leave the door open because of bugs. So, this great magnet screen door makes a huge difference. I even had a surgery recently and was wheelchair bound, this door makes it great to get out without having to worry about the door closing.
customer_reviews.author: Potter

customer_reviews.title: Simply the best
customer_reviews.text: These are the best magnetic door screens out there. They looks really good and the seams are nice and thick. No plastic pieces with magnets an them. This thing is solid and won't droop down. The screen is nice and thick as well. I've been through a lot of these things and they usually only look good for a week or so. I've had this one for a couple of months, and it still looks brand new. Look no further!
customer_reviews.author: Santa8T

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: This is much better quality than our last one which was more like a fabric material. Our dogs torn the old one down and it was shredded within a week. It’s been up for an hour and the dogs have come in and out dozens of times and so far so good. They give you tons of Velcro and the screen itself has the soft side of the Velcro all the way around it so you can put the other side wherever you want. We followed the instructions and it seems to be a good hold now.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Works well on a patio sliding door frame, for big (and small) dogs and people alike
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for our sliding door. The screen needed to be replaced, and I wasn't sure if this would fit on the sliding screen door frame itself or to the sliding door jamb. My main goal was to create a dog door for my giant dogs. The size I ordered worked for the door jamb, and it's been going well for a couple months now. It's a little long at the bottom, but could easily be modified if I took it off and remounted it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great Value. Heavy Duty Durability.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install. Very happy I ourchased this fiberglass mesh screen. My dogs ripped the other ones with lighter materials with their nails when they scratch to go outside. This is super durable & stands strong against big dogs. Super convenient for when guests are over so no one has to open the door repeatedly. Easy to walk through. Heavy duty magnets keep screen closed.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Product is as described
customer_reviews.text: I used it for back door. It barely fit so definitely measure exactly where you want to put it up. Because of this, it doesn’t shut automatically and their are tiny gaps when closed but it works for my purpose if letting my dogs have fresh air without having to let them in and out. I didn’t see where this product was available in bigger size so I ordered from another seller.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: My mom kept buying cheap magnetic screen doors and they would always rip or fall off or fall apart in one way or another. I got her this one and it is fabulous. The magnets are bars that go all the way down (rather than smaller rectangle magnets placed intermittently). It stays closed in the breeze and the screen itself is much better quality so it hasn't gotten holes or tears. So far so good. She ended up ordering two more for other doors in her house.
customer_reviews.author: SDubGold

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Being FL residents this was a MUST in our balcony. Since we RWS t it was really our only option. This is very well made, we had a cheaper one, but it didn’t hold up. This one our dogs can go in and out, it’s made out of great material. Magnets are strong and even with strong winds, we’ve not had it desperate, side note we live a mile from the beach, so winds get crazy! You won’t regret this purchase if properly installed.
customer_reviews.author: Philana Bryant

customer_reviews.title: JUST buy it!! Cheap but Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Great for my backdoor! Fits and now i have a breeze without mosquitos and flys buzzing by trying to feast upon me or my beastie's through the night. My cat is kinda a dum-dum and only goes through the screen when he's scared and not thinking he's locked out. And my obese Min Pin loves rhe freedom of the backyard. Except I agree with the Opossum Review guy CAREFUL of the CRITTERS that only come out at night!!! We have a raccoon that comes every night and my lil fatty dog thinks he's bigger than he is. So I do have to be aware after dark . But its a great value and serves its purpose well
customer_reviews.author: Towbnr

customer_reviews.title: worked well until it was over 100 degrees
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to put up and worked well at keeping the bugs out. Once we had a heat wave, the adhesive came undone and it fell down. I don't want to mark it too poorly since I may have not cleaned it well enough? And it only had issues when it was around 106, which I'm not sure if I should expect something at this price to hold up to. I'm between a 3 and 4
customer_reviews.author: Sage Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Magnets
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through a bunch of magnet doors and I do like the quality of this one. We got this yesterday and it was automatically closing on its own, not even 24 hours later, I find myself self closing the magnets together. It’s a little annoying because I have small kids and small dogs so I wanted something that would close on its own when they walked through.
customer_reviews.author: Karma Mama

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, now we can keep our door open!
customer_reviews.text: The screen is really nice. The magnets close and seal very well. We purchased the fiberglass version and it does not prevent the natural light to come in. My only suggestion is to be careful when attaching the tape to the door frame. I had to adjust one of the tapes and because the adhesive is very strong, it took out some of the paint. I do recommend this screen for good quality and good price.
customer_reviews.author: sreih

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a different brand with this one and oh my! What a difference! The magnets going seamlessly from mid top tp bottom alleviates the gaping problem I had with the other screen. ( and the issue of the magnets coming off). This screen feels and appears at least 3 x’s sturdier! Love it💕 ***after one year’s use, it did rip. A nice 4 inch gap! The bottom edges fell off too. Still giving it 5 stars cos it’s sturdier then most. Reordering.
customer_reviews.author: Shanee Michael

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic easy upgrade
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install, I plan to add a small piece of metal so that the sides will simple hold themselves open. One side already catch's the fixed door and it works well. Fantastic option for our house. Took our dogs (2 Small-Medium dogs) a little to get used to it, but they are now. The cat will get stuck outside sometimes as it's easier to go out than in with our setup. The bottom hangs down past our door frame as there is a minor step there.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Marchant

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Durable
customer_reviews.text: I honestly did not think this product would last past a few days with 3 rambunctious boys and a crazy dog, but it has been outstanding. Our dog constantly goes in and out of the back door. This screen has been the perfect addition to our home, keeping out 90% of the bugs/flies, while allowing our dog to enjoy the outdoors at her leisure!
customer_reviews.author: Brandi Russell-Eastwood

customer_reviews.title: Best one yet
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this item from several different suppliers - this one is by far the best one yet. The only downside is that it's a bit large for the door, but I put that on me because I didn't measure before selecting the size. I have three dogs who have "trained" me that when they want to come in, they scratch at the back door when it's closed. Other panels have gotten shredded or holes poked in it by the time the "leave the door open" season is over. This one still looks new out of the box. This seems also to stick better to the door frame than previous purchases. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Daina

customer_reviews.title: Works well enough
customer_reviews.text: We’ve had ours up for less than 6 months and the bottom edging is coming apart and the center top has had to be reattached with tacks already. But for the price, it is what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great Material.
customer_reviews.text: The adhesion does not adhere well to my door frame. I had to use the whole velcro tape they gave me already. It just keeps falling off. So far it's been standing well now. The material is awesome on this product. I wished I would've bought a bigger size though. The size I bought adhere to the inner part of the frame, if I would've bought a bigger one, it'll adhere to the outer part, but it'll be too long. If it falls next time, I'd either just throw it away or see how much velcro costs.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Devora

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good screen
customer_reviews.text: I wish they made a broader range of widths, but it's a pretty decent magnetic screen for the money. The magnets work well and I was able to mount it to a narrower doorway by folding the edges over slightly and attaching the edges to the door frame using strips of thin plywood screwed into the trim. Did not use the adhesive velcro material.
customer_reviews.author: 21 Truck

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be made of a durable mesh. It pinned up together nicely even tough my door is a bit smaller that the frame of the mesh. If your door is smaller, just put up your Velcro, attach the curtain with the Velcro, then when adding the pins for support, pull in and fold in the mesh curtain a bit and pin it down on top of the Velcro. Worked nicely for me.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is great to keep bugs out of our house from the door leading into the house from garage. Great product!!! One suggestion: We pinned a handle to each side for something to grab onto to open-would be great if they sewed them on when making it. It gets tricky to open the doors when they are magnetized to the door behind it.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl L. Wistrom

customer_reviews.title: One of the Better Ones Out There
customer_reviews.text: Just bought another one of this fiberglass screens. My first one of exact same brand and kind was purchased on July2019. Homerda was by far the longest lasting one we have had. Like many others, who have animals and/or dumb human families these screens doesn't usually last long. So under $20 lasting a year is a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Susan W

customer_reviews.title: size
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like it! As a word of caution for other buyers, buy a size smaller than actual door measurements. My door measured 36" and in the past I order that exact size and it was way big. So I decided to buy smaller size (34") and fit just perfect. Relatively durable, but there isn't much traffic going through the actual screen. As for weather durability, it does well in all kinds of conditions and keeps bugs outside.
customer_reviews.author: fejadazu

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the bugs out
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 so we could put one on our main door to the kitchen and the outside door to the porch. They have really kept the flies out of our back porch so far this summer. Not too sure how durable they will be as we have a rottweiler that loves to run thru them to go outside. So far so good. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: M Walker

customer_reviews.title: Very Good.  Does what it is advertised  to do.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great idea and doubles in pinch for as long as you need it to. Be careful to get it where you want it on the first try bc the adhesive doesn't stay put after a couple tries. Also, pull up slightly at top middle magnetic seam and put a tack at center into the wall to ensure it closes evenly. Those tips will make a big difference.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Downey Fish

customer_reviews.title: Dog LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love that they can no go in and out to our deck on their own. We have only had the screen jobs month so I’m not sure about durability but for the price I think we will get enough use to justice it. It wasn’t the easiest to put up length wise. Not so much because of the screen itself but because of the door we mounted to. I wish it were easier to adjust the length. I’m glad that it came with extra Velcro as well because I think that will prolong the products life.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Installed these a few weeks ago and so far, they have held up against children and dog constantly going in and out. No issues, they adhere well to wood frame, and stay closed even when windy. FYI, they will stick to a metal door, so you will constantly be pulling them off the door to shut them.
customer_reviews.author: Motivation

customer_reviews.title: I am amazed
customer_reviews.text: I bought 6 of these and installed 2 thus far all by myself. The screen is very durable and has held up to my very active 2 yr old granddaughter. The magnets are truly powerful. I love these so much I just ordered 6 more. My niece came by, saw them and asked where did I get them so I sent her the link. Great product, really great price!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Mc

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the money
customer_reviews.text: I installed this on the side door of my enclosed trailer. I put construction adhesive under the velcro just to make sure it would adhere long term on my plywood around the door. I've only had it on one trip so long term durability is yet to be determined but it does what it is supposed to which is great.
customer_reviews.author: Denise L. Little

customer_reviews.title: Awesome idea well executed
customer_reviews.text: These magnetic screens are so much fun! Once the weather gets nice, we will install so our three dogs can wander in and out of the house to their hearts’ content. The bugs stay out, and the dogs and people are happy. We will get at least one full season out of this very affordable product.
customer_reviews.author: corgi lover

customer_reviews.title: Good screen!
customer_reviews.text: Better than the last one I tried. It comes with tacks to secure the Velcro on to the door frame. My door faces south and the Velcro glue melted on my last net. The little tacks make the difference. The screen fabric is better quality too. It has a slicker surface and my dog’s paws don’t damage it at all.
customer_reviews.author: alaskan

customer_reviews.title: Low price but very good quality.
customer_reviews.text: I was suspicious if it was a good idea to go to cheapest one but surprised me. I installed to my deck door and worked great. I used couple extra nails in order to have it stronger (very old door and it is hard to stick something) but overall I am happy with this. I would buy again this one if I need for another door
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Was not sure what to expect since this was under $20. However, I am impressed with how perfectly this screen fits in front of our outside door. It’s been on for a couple of weeks now, and I have no complaints. I’m also happy that my little dog has learned to go out and come back in unassisted!
customer_reviews.author: Jacquie Preston

customer_reviews.title: Works incredibly well
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace a similar screen that had fewer velcro attachment points and which had overlapping panels which frequently didn't seal properly. This one has velcro along the entire perimeter and uses magnets along the entire length where the panels connect. It works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Michael WC

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying these mesh screens for a few years. This is the first time I didn’t purchase from my local Walmart. This brand seems much more durable- the mesh is thicker and seems sturdier than others I’ve had. Love it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Payne

customer_reviews.title: Good deal at twice the price
customer_reviews.text: I have a cargo trailer that I use as a camper. Used this to make a screen door. It was about 8 inches too long. 2 4" folds at the top held in place with 3m vhb double stick tape made it the right length. Supplied velcro is super adhesive. The screen looks good and functions as designed.
customer_reviews.author: RNAH

customer_reviews.title: So should have bought this years earlier
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. Should have bought this thing years ago. Next best thing to a motion sensor door. The convenience of this is off the chart. I would buy this one since it was a little more heavy duty. There are cheaper versions of this available but this one seems really durable.
customer_reviews.author: J. smith

customer_reviews.title: Super Strong Magnet- Works Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Unlike the other brands I have tried before, this brand is awesome! For a cheap price, the product is built durable and strong. The net material is perfect to let air in but keep even the small bugs out. I love how strong the magnetic strip is and how it returns right back to close even when my dog runs through it back and forth. Great product for a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Product is Great!
customer_reviews.text: I like to leave the door open nice weather days for the dogs to run in and out. This is perfect, I did have to buy different Velcro because it would fall, I think because of all the traffic in and out of the door. I took it down for the winter and now it's starting to warm back up, up it goes!
customer_reviews.author: dkferny1017

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit, love the material, strong velcro.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit, love the material. The velcro seems to be stronger that a previous one ive had before (other brand). I also like that it includes black push pins for porous surfaces/ wood. The magnets seems stronger compared to my previous one. Seems durable but i just hung it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Lechu

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't stay closed
customer_reviews.text: The "tacks" are far too big. Wherever you put them the Velcro doesn't stick. Just using the glue adhesive is a joke. I finally pulled the tacks out and used a staple gun. Better, but the Velcro doesn't hold the top very well, then it doesn't stay closed. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Mom to boys

customer_reviews.title: Great quality material
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality material from which this product is made. Previously I had purchased similar products but the material was fabric so it snagged or ripped. But this material is the dame material used to make window screens. Will last longer and can take the wear and tear. Great choice
customer_reviews.author: Kayzarena

customer_reviews.title: Great screen
customer_reviews.text: We bought a replacement after a full year of use. There was a small tear after someone stepped on it and pulled it. Great product! I’ve tried a different brand but this was better. I wish the magnetic center comes together on its own but usually we have to help it close
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: works like it says it will
customer_reviews.text: Installed in front of a sliding door, it is used to allow the dogs in and out of the house, without the mosquitos. The only problem is when the air conditioning is running, and you want to open and close the door, you need to sneak you hand in the middle then open the door. But it works like it should
customer_reviews.author: ckelsey

customer_reviews.title: works
customer_reviews.text: very cool product, easy to install, I have to say that if you have high traffic going thru it might start fall a little, the tricky part is that if comes out just a little bit, the magnetics don't work, so it has to be 100% glued and straight to be able to close on it's own
customer_reviews.author: Pryscilla

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I like to feed the raccoons and this is great so the little ones can come inside to eat so the adults don't bother them. I was having issues with bugs coming in the house. Now I have no issues. Easy to install. I take it down after feeding the raccoons. Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: natalie creasman

customer_reviews.title: It actually closes!!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought several OTHER versions of this screen from various stores and companies. this is by far the best. Costs abit more but so far seems to be worth it. Heavier, many more magnets, weighted at bottom . I adhered it with the little tacks bcuz my door frame is very textured wood. I'm definitely be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Cydharhar

customer_reviews.title: Upgraded Quality Screen!
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying the As Seen on TV brand for years and tried this one recently-so glad I did! This is a much sturdier screen and they give you a roll of the velcro instead of the little pieces! I am very happy and will purchase this again in the future!
customer_reviews.author: S. Harper

customer_reviews.title: Much Better Quality Screen Than My Previous One
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the quality of this magnetic screen. My previous one did not stay on the door very well. This one features full velcro attachment on three sides so is very secure. The full length magnets hold much better in windy conditions. So far a very superior magnetic screen.
customer_reviews.author: Jim B

customer_reviews.title: better than other brands
customer_reviews.text: I use this type of screen every summer on the door to my deck. It allows my cats on the deck without letting the bugs in. This screen fabric is much nicer than any of the others I've use. The screen is so nice that you hardly notice it when you look out. the magnets are covered (I've had others fall off) and strong enough to close well. It is a good size and a bit larger than others making it easier to install . Cats love it too. I am very pleased with this screen.
customer_reviews.author: dg

customer_reviews.title: Closes & stays closed easy.
customer_reviews.text: I love my screen door. We didn't use the adhesive because it was a tad too big for the opening so we used a staple gun to install it. It's been 6 months & it is holding up great. The dogs love it because they can come & go as they please when the door is open. When they come in, the bottom doesn't always close back but it is easy to touch it with your foot & it snaps right back in place. The magnets are great.
customer_reviews.author: Nana05

customer_reviews.title: its very long but good mesh and keeps shade.
customer_reviews.text: I like this shade for my door but it was way to long I wish it had a place where u could trim it to fit like a one size fit all and just trim to fit the door if its to wide or long but other then that it seems ok but since at my home the door I needed it on it didn't fit I returned it but will find one that will fit and help so good luck have a nice day lh.
customer_reviews.author: Singlelife36

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work at all, the Velcro is supposed to stick to the top of the door, it doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: debby

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: 1.The net seems to be very durable and have two different mounting options. 2.easy to mount and keeps bugs away. 3.we will see how the adhesive holds after a few months. 4.My dog learned how to get in and out instanously.
customer_reviews.author: wentian zhou

customer_reviews.title: Useful but not full proof
customer_reviews.text: Its a good screen, but the glue is poor quality, the screen peels of in a couple of weeks. Hammering it on door frame with thumbnail is the only way to keep it hanging. The bottom does not have magnets. I got spiders climbing up insode the house through the large gap at the bottom between screen and door. A slight more attention to the product design and quality control would have made this a great product.
customer_reviews.author: book dude

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: This screen was perfect for where I needed it and I love the way it self-closes. Because of the environmental type of area I live in, I also stapled the sides of the screen to the outside door frame. The screen is very durable. I am sure it will last for years.
customer_reviews.author: K-lee Starland

product_meta.title: Homearda Magnetic Screen Door - Full Frame, Fits Door Up To 34x82 Inch
product_meta.description:
Size Name:Fits Door Size 34''X82''| Color:Black-Polyester It is different from other magnetic screen doors,it is more durable used and it holds up well.

- Easy installation 
- Pet friendly access
- Magnetic hands free entry
- Strong magnets sewn in, to provide seamless automatic closure
- High performance Velcro and tacks included to keep the mesh up
- Micro mesh keeps the smallest bugs out
- Protection for your family from invading insects
- The low-cost way to economically cool your home
- Buy Risk Free with our 100% money back guarantee
feature_bullets: Homearda Magnetic Screen Door fits all door sizes Up to 34x82, Actual Screen Size 36X83.Please measure your door first!
EVEN THE SMALLEST bugs and Mosquitoes Have No Chance To Get in, While Let Fresh Air In.

MULTI FUNCTION.EASY INSTALL ,OPENS AND CLOSES LIKE MAGIC! The middle seam of the screen door is strategically lined with powerful magnetic cubes and magnetic strips that allow the door to open easily and close seamlessly!

26 POWERFUL MAGNETS, sewn into the reinforced edges, can instantly open and automatically close, so you can carry food, drinks and some other things from inside to out, Children and pets also can go in and out of the house with ease.

100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE,If you are not satisfied, just return it, we will replace it or refund your total purchase,TOTALLY RISK FREE, so just buy with confidence now! TIPS: If the magnets separately not close automatically after installation, please adjust the width not so tight or the middle of the top need a little higher.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars2,534 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
